transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sir, baat karun IndiaMART se?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sir, baat karun IndiaMART se?
Executive: Hello ji, baat ho rahi hai IndiaMART se. Haan ji, hello.
Customer: Hello, hello. Sir, baat hui thi aapse na, abhi idhar aapne call disconnect kar diya tha, fir aapka feedback gaya hai.
Customer: Mere ko baat hi nahi karne de rahe sir.
Executive: Sir aap disconnect to karunga na mere ko baat hi nahi karne de rahe. Connect sahi karne ke liye to phone kar raha hu sir, aapka problem hai usse kuch.
Customer: [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk to IndiaMART.

- Customer says the executive disconnected the call.



Resolution:

- Executive says he will disconnect if customer doesn't talk.

- Executive called to fix the connection.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- call disconnect, connection issue, feedback
